subject: Coffee with the Principal Apr 24 @ 8
body: Asalem alaikum Parents, InshaAllah, this message reaches you in a state of good health and strong iman. InshaAllah, we would like to return to having "Coffee with the Principal" Two sessions remain for this school year: Thursday, April 24th from 8:00 am - 9:00am. Thursday, May 15th from 8:00am - 9:00am. Please come to engage in a positive conversation about our school. Hot beverages and snacks will be available and you are welcome to bring your own beverage. Please park in front of the building and enter door 15 and take the stairs or elevator to the second floor. Please follow signs to the exact location (TBA) for the "Coffee with the Principal". We look forward to seeing you there! Baraka Allahu fikum. Admin. Team Al-Arqam Islamic School & College Preparatory 6990 65th Street Sacramento, CA  95823 916-391-3333
